item.description:
Arrive at 10:00 and launch by 10:30 AM

Organizers: Mark Roberts, mroberts@CIA.com 401-533-1883 cell

Check RICKA Message Board for last minute cancellations: http://members.boardh...

Trip is not suitable for kayaks over 15 feet. Narrow and twisty river. Paddle upstream against the current and then return with the current to the put-in. Beautiful paddle.

Bring a lunch.

Zeke's Bridge state access. N41 39 906 - W071 37 115

Directions from 95 South.. Take exit 6 To Rt. 3 north ( DO NOT take exit 6-A or 6-B Hopkins Hill Road) Take a right at the bottom of the exit and follow 3 North for about a mile and a half. Take a left onto Harkney Hill Road. Follow for a little over a mile and look for the access for Zekes Bridge.

Directions from 95 North, Take exit 6 to Rt. 3 north. ( DO NOT take exit 6-A or 6 B Hopkins Hill Road) Take a left at the bottom of the exit and follow 3 North for about a mile and a half. Take a left onto Harkney Hill Road. Follow for a little over a mile and look for the access for Zekes Bridge.

Check RICKA for additional paddles scheduled
RICKA Schedule:
http://www.ricka-flat...

RICKA Blackstone Paddlers has additional free instruction and beginner paddles
Blackstone Valley Paddlers
http://www.ricka-flat...
item.how_to_find_us: Orange/Yellow Riot Voyager kayak, shaved head
item.name: Big River, Coventry RI
